PageTitle: display bgp mvpn all peer verbose
FuncDef: The display bgp mvpn all peer verbose command displays detailed information about peers in the BGP-MVPN address family.
CLIs: display bgp mvpn all peer [ <ipv4-address> ] verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of a peer to be displayed.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp mvpn all peer verbose
Total number of peers : 2                 Peers in established state : 2
Peer            V          AS  MsgRcvd  MsgSent  OutQ  Up/Down       State PrefRcv
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Users can run this command to view detailed information about MVPN BGP neighbors, such as BGP timer information, number of sent and received routes, capabilities supported by neighbors, number of sent and received BGP messages, and enabled configurations.
